Fighter Mechanic United States Air Force June 1974  –  July 1998  (24 years 2 months) I went through Basic at Lackland AFB, TX in July and August of 1974. I then went to Sheppard AFB, TX for technical training from September through November of 1974. My first duty assignment was Nellis AFB, NV until I left for Kunsan AB, ROK in August of 1976. I left Kunsan in August of 1977 for Homestead AFB, FL. I left Homestead in October of 1978 for Griffis AFB, NY. I left Griffis in October 1980 for a return tour at Kunsan. I left Kunsan in October of 1981 for Cannon AFB, NM. I left Cannon in November 1986, headed back to Nellis but this time to join the Thunderbirds. I left the Thunderbirds in 1989, headed for Osan AB, ROK. I completed my tour at Osan in 1990 and was assigned to the Reserve unit at Bergrstrom AFB, TX as an enlisted maintenance advisor for their transition from F-4s to F-16s. I left Bergstrom in November of 1993 and headed to Spangdahlem AB, GE. I left Spang in May of 1998 to take terminal leave and retire from Randolph AFB, TX in July. I left Kunsan in August of 1977 for Homestead AFB, FL. I left Homestead in October of 1978 for Griffis AFB, NY. I left Griffis in October 1980 for a return tour at Kunsan. I left Kunsan in October of 1981 for Cannon AFB, NM. I left Cannon in November 1986, headed back to Nellis but this time to join the Thunderbirds. I left the Thunderbirds in 1989, headed for Osan AB, ROK. I completed my tour at Osan in 1990 and was assigned to the Reserve unit at Bergrstrom AFB, TX as an enlisted maintenance advisor for their transition from F-4s to F-16s. I left Bergstrom in November of 1993 and headed to Spangdahlem AB, GE. I left Spang in May of 1998 to take terminal leave and retire from Randolph AFB, TX in July.
